member.name: ISyncMgrSyncResult.Result
member.summary: Gets the result of a or call.
member.param: The current status of the progress report. See .
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrSyncResult
member.summary: Exposes a method that applications calling can use to get the result of a or call.
